room_title: Escape room "Silo" by The Escapery in Atlanta
review: We chose the Silo room and it was great. This was my first time and I will definitely be back to try the other rooms. It was very challenging and the hour just flew by. I would recommend this to anyone that wants to try something a bit different.

room_title: Escape room "Silo" by The Escapery in Atlanta
review: We had an awesome work outing here! Highly recommend! Olivia was an excellent guide and made 110% sure we had a fantastic experience. Couldn't be happier.

room_title: Escape room "Silo" by The Escapery in Atlanta
review: Went in with my family shortly after Christmas. Not only was it open, we had a blast! The room was difficult and a very fun challenge. Jacob was a great host and was happy to help when we needed it. He also stayed in character which is a huge plus. We all had a great time and we escaped!
